price: (29) They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
